content: var Result; var yourInput = "placeholder"; var computerGen; var count = 0; var Win = 0; var Lose = 0; var Tie = 0; var Rock = 0; var Paper = 0; var Scissors = 0; document.getElementById("Tally").innerHTML = count; function getName() { var nam3 = prompt("What Is Your Name?"); document.getElementById("nombre").innerHTML = nam3; } var compare = function(choice1, choice2) { if (choice1 === choice2) { Result = "Tie!"; Tie++; } if (choice1 === "rock") { if (choice2 === "scissors") { Result = "Win"; Win++; } else { if (choice2 === "paper") { Result = "Lose"; Lose++; } } } if (choice1 === "paper") { if (choice2 === "rock") { Result = "Win"; Win++; } else { if (choice2 === "scissors") { Result = "Lose"; Lose++; } } } if (choice1 === "scissors") { if (choice2 === "rock") { Result = "Lose"; Lose++; } else { if (choice2 === "paper") { Result = "Win"; Win++; } } } }; var getCheckedRadio = function() { var radioButtons = document.getElementsByName("yourC"); for (var x = 0; x < radioButtons.length; x++) { if (radioButtons[x].checked) { yourInput = radioButtons[x].value; } } }; function playplay() { computerGen = Math.random(); getCheckedRadio(); if (computerGen < 0.34) { computerGen = "rock"; Rock++; } else if (computerGen <= 0.67) { computerGen = "paper"; Paper++; } else { computerGen = "scissors"; Scissors++; } document.getElementById("CC").innerHTML = computerGen; compare(yourInput, computerGen); document.getElementById("RES").innerHTML = Result; count++; document.getElementById("Tally").innerHTML = count + " time(s)!"; document.getElementById("Wi").innerHTML = Win; document.getElementById("Lo").innerHTML = Lose; document.getElementById("Ti").innerHTML = Tie; document.getElementById("rr").innerHTML = Rock; document.getElementById("pp").innerHTML = Paper; document.getElementById("ss").innerHTML = Scissors; }
